title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Fragment of printed cotton with a striped pattern of branches spreading out from a narrow stripe, in red and dark brown on a white ground with brown picotage. Note 5-pointed stars on one blossom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Elinor Merrell. 1973-62-19.
